headline: As Cold Weather Looms, Generac Urges Homeowners to Prepare for Power Outages
summary: Generac Holdings Inc. (NYSE: GNRC), a leading global designer, manufacturer and provider of energy technology solutions and other power products, is encouraging homeowners across the country to build a cold weather preparedness and backup power plan to protect their homes and families during potential winter-weather induced power outages.
